meta.job_title: Mailing and Material Management Services Director

duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct day-to-day operations of Mailing and Material Management Services (MMMS) business units
Develop and manage department budgets and make resource allocation decisions
Direct MMMS service delivery, logistics, and productivity reporting to reduce the number of touch points for customer mail/materials
Establish the department’s sustainability goals and manage relationships with USC sustainability office and environmental community

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Logistics, Business Management, or related field (Master’s preferred)
